sense.gloss: to gouge, to hollow out, to bore, to excavate, to scoop out
to greatly perturb, to cause emotional pain
to get to the bottom of things, to relentlessly bring the truth to light
to wrench open, to prize open, to pick (a lock)
to be gouged, to be hollowed, to become hollow
to have an underbite, to have a protruding chin
to be concaved, to have a concave shape
to dig out, to gouge out, to hollow out
to scoop, to ladle, to bail
to pry, to prize, to prise
to stick into and move around, to dig around in, to pick (i.e. one's teeth)
to force something (into), to thrust forcibly (into)
to gouge out, to cut out, to scoop out
to bring to light, to reveal
to dig out, to hollow out, to cut into

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑鉄↑↓てつ↓の↑棒↑↓ぼう↓で↑鍵↑↓かぎ↓のかかったドアを↑抉↑↓こ↓じ↑開↑↓あ↓けた。
sdata.e: He pried open the locked door with a crowbar.

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓の↑目↑↓め↓を↑抉↑↓えぐ↓り↑出↑↓だ↓すぞ！
